description: Endurance is required last 1½ is all up hill. Some ropes in the wash to get  over boulders is required. The ropes are in place, there is a trail to the south that bypasses the rope but adds 10 minutes to the hike.
directions: Entrance to the trail head is of highway 160 about 4 miles past the red rock  exit 159. Then drive two miles on dirt road (high clearance is required) and park at the end.
title: Hidden Peak
